title: HELP: Mobile hotspot forever logging on
body:
Hi

I normally play league using my mobile hotspot and ever since the most recent patch (6.6 or 6.7, not sure which), I have been 'forever logging on'. 
I type my username and password in and it's just forever on 'logging on'.

BUT the weird thing is that my ethernet network logs me in fine. The only reason I don't use the ethernet connection is because it's FFFFFking slow. :(

I hope someone can help me out as it's been close to a week of no league and I feel myself become rustier by the second. 
Thanks in advance

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for the delayed response.

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps at all.

Same issue for me. Also with Optus.

Have tried [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) with no success....

Okay so I have borrowed a vodafone simcard from a friend and it seems to be working fine. So from this, I can safely say. Fuck Optus.

But I still hope Optus gets their shit together so I can play on my hotspot and not through my friend's simcard. :(

Hi I've tried every riot suggested network troubleshooting eg. ip flushing, switching between public and specific DNS, turning off and on etc. 
I really don't want to reinstall so if there's anything at all~~ 

I'm with Optus if it's relevant. 
LSKDFJLSDKJF :(

* Also I have just updated to 6.8 and I am still having the same problem. Sigh~ {{item:3070}}
Having the same issue. No idea where to begin looking for information about it but it is fucking frustrating for sure.

Also, I connect my hotspot via usb cable. I have tried switching it to a different usb port but still same problem. 
I have also tried using a wireless dongle and connecting my hotspot to that but it still doesn't work. :(
